name: @yeldirium/redux-combine-getters
description: A utility for combining redux getters analogous to combineReducers.

scripts.publish-patch: yarn test && yarn version --patch && git push --tags && git push
scripts.publish-minor: yarn test && yarn version --minor && git push --tags && git push
scripts.publish-major: yarn test && yarn version --major && git push --tags && git push
